unnormalised: Hey, did you guys know about the PM Poshan Shakti Nirman scheme? It aims to provide 1 hot cooked meal to children in govt. & govt.-aided schools, which is actually pretty cool, especially for kids from underprivileged backgrounds. More info at pmposhanshakti.moe.gov.in.
normalised: Hey, did you guys know about the P-M Poshan Shakti Nirman scheme? It aims to provide one hot cooked meal to children in government and government-aided schools, which is actually pretty cool, especially for kids from underprivileged backgrounds. More info at p-m-poshan-shakti dot m-o-e dot government dot in.
